Interface PlayerRepository

All Superinterfaces:

  • Method Details

    • findPlayerByName

      @Query("SELECT t FROM Player t WHERE t.name = ?1") List<Player> findPlayerByName(String chars)
      Find all players whose name equals the given string.
      Parameters:
      chars - The name of the player you want to find.
      Returns:
      A list of players with the name that matches the parameter.

    • playerExist

      @Query("SELECT t FROM Player t WHERE t.name = ?1 AND t.position = ?2 AND t.birthday = ?3 AND t.team = ?4") List<Player> playerExist(String chars, String position, Date birthday, Team t)
      This function returns a list of players that have the same name, position, birthday, and team as the parameters.
      Parameters:
      chars - the name of the player
      position - String
      birthday - java.util.Date
      t - the entity class
      Returns:
      A list of players that match the given parameters.

    • deleteGoals

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM Goal g WHERE g.player = ?1") void deleteGoals(Player p)
      Delete all goals for a given player.
      Parameters:
      p - The player whose goals we want to delete.

    • deleteCards

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM Card c WHERE c.player = ?1") void deleteCards(Player p)
      Delete all cards that belong to a player.
      Parameters:
      p - The player whose cards we want to delete.

    • getTeam

      @Query("SELECT p.team.name FROM Player p WHERE p.playerId = ?1") List<String> getTeam(int id)
      Get the name of the team that the player with the given id plays for.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the player
      Returns:
      A list of strings
